content:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/implementers/subject/JSON.20schema - there appears to be a genuine issue here. This would be a correction only to the json schema. I believe that we should make this change.

The important part of this is the following part of the json schema spec: http://json-schema.org/latest/json-schema-core.html#rfc.section.7 - URIs are logical, not literal, but I generated a literal reference
